text: Language-Specific Issues Have you investigated the language-specific issues for classes in your specific programming language? Additional Resources Classes in General cc2e.com/0679 Meyer, Bertrand. Object-Oriented Software Construction, 2d ed. New York, NY: Prentice Hall PTR, 1997. This book contains an in-depth discussion of abstract data types and explains how they form the basis for classes. Chapters 14–16 discuss inheritance in depth. Meyer provides an argument in favor of multiple inheritance in Chapter 15.

hash: [{"dateTime":"2022-11-04T11:18:42.753Z","text":"A good general rule is that a system-level diagram like Figure 5-5 should be an acyclic graph. In other words, a program shouldn't contain any circular relationships in which Class A uses Class B, Class B uses Class C, and Class C uses Class A.","hash":"4cde34e9742d806328bfc3d78a6a7d32","fileHash":"c3d57eb88086a04b1e04d06a9b6188e5","chapterSeperator":"^Chapter \\d\\.","ID":73,"language":"en"},{"hash":"[{\"dateTime\":\"2022-11-04T09:42:10.029Z\",\"text\":\"Chapter 1. Welcome to Software Construction\",\"hash\":\"fc7f5fdec04d3984cc04732e8b7e6f39\",\"fileHash\":\"c3d57eb88086a04b1e04d06a9b6188e5\",\"chapterSeperator\":\"^Chapter \\\\d\\\\.\",\"ID\":73,\"language\":\"en\"}]","dateTime":"2022-11-04T09:46:40.131Z","text":"","ID":1229}]

text: 伴随着话语，暗魔大妖皇手中的厄运珠骤然爆发出强烈的气息，那份压迫感瞬间变得更加强烈了，就连水晶城城主府的建筑上都仿佛蒙上了一层灰色。   龙族作为第一强族，自然是气运极其强大的，厄运珠的厄运本来就需要气运来平衡。如果暗魔大妖皇将这厄运珠的能量充分的调动出来，那么，整个龙族的气运都将被其剥夺，龙族很可能就此一蹶不振。   厄运珠在暗魔大妖皇手中和当初在李昭鹏手中不可同日而语。在皇者级别的力量催动下，厄运珠绝对是最顶级的神器。尤其是暗魔大妖皇本身就擅长驱动魔器，厄运珠轻易不会反噬到他。 作者：重生唐三抢先看 https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv19540062?spm_id_from=333.999.0.0 出处：bilibili
